mapper.update: update commodity_num set commodity_id = #{commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity_store_id = #{commodity_store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sample = #{sample,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_commodity = #{return_commodity,jdbcType=INTEGER} where commodity_num_id = #{commodity_num_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select commodity_num_id, commodity_id, num, commodity_store_id, sample, return_commodity from commodity_num
